title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 69.2 - Substitutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 69.2 - Substitutions

State Regulations
(a) For a policy providing mortgage pool insurance issued prior to January 11, 1995, there shall be no additions to or substitutions in a pool of mortgages after one year following the issuance of the policy. (b) For a policy providing mortgage pool insurance issued on or after January 11, 1995, there shall be no additions to or substitutions in a pool of mortgages after two years following the issuance of the policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11

69.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
